data.title: This Is The Last Movie That Fred Ward Was In Before His Tragic Death
data.meta_description: A look back at the last film role of beloved character actor Fred Ward.
data.text:
The devastating death of Fred Ward on May 8, 2022, was tragic news for fans of the 79-year-old star's work. Ward had no shortage of serious actor accolades and acting credits, including a notable final role in his lengthy résumé.

The actor’s last movie appearance was in the 2013 buddy cop movie "2 Guns," where he starred opposite Hollywood A-listers Denzel Washington and Mark Wahlberg. Ward plays Rear Admiral Tuwey in this story about a mission to retrieve a narcotics shipment from a major drug lord.

“2 Guns" is a light-hearted buddy cop comedy with a 65 percent critical rating on Rotten Tomatoes. The film co-stars James Marsden, Bill Paxton, Paula Patton, and Edward James Olmos, making it clear that Ward ended his big-screen career on a pretty cool note.
